user_prompt: Create Epics and User Stories for the usecase

epics.title: Secure User Authentication with Multi-Factor Login
epics.summary: Implement multi-factor authentication to ensure secure access to the banking portal.
epics.description: Develop a secure authentication module that allows customers to log in using credentials and an additional factor such as OTP, biometrics, or a hardware token. The module should support password policies, account recovery, login activity logs, and automatic session expirations. The system must comply with banking security standards to safeguard customer data and prevent unauthorized access.

epics.title: Personalized and Responsive Customer Dashboard
epics.summary: Create a dashboard that displays personalized products and services with responsive design.
epics.description: Design a dynamic, personalized dashboard that presents the customer’s account summary, available products, and services tailored to their eligibility and usage patterns. The interface should be fully responsive and provide an optimized user experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Include navigational shortcuts to key features and ensure accessibility compliance throughout the design.

epics.title: Streamlined Account Opening and Service Workflows
epics.summary: Enable customers to initiate and manage account opening or service modification requests.
epics.description: Implement guided workflows to facilitate new account openings and service modification requests. Each workflow should minimize the number of steps required, support pre-filled customer data, offer field validation, and allow customers to upload necessary documentation during submission. These workflows must integrate with backend systems to ensure accurate processing and record-keeping.

epics.title: Real-Time Request Tracking and Email Notifications
epics.summary: Provide real-time status updates and automated notifications for submitted requests.
epics.description: Develop a real-time tracking module that allows customers to monitor the progress of their service requests. Integrate with an email notification system to automatically alert customers upon status changes, approvals, or rejections. Ensure all updates are reflected instantly in the portal and provide clear visibility into process stages and timelines.

epics.title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Audit Logs
epics.summary: Maintain a secure history of user activities and transactions within the portal.
epics.description: Create a structured activity log that records and displays every user interaction within the portal, including logins, service requests, and document uploads. The history view should be intuitive and searchable. Implement robust data archiving and ensure compliance with legal and regulatory data retention requirements while preserving performance and responsiveness.

epics.title: Save and Resume Incomplete Applications
epics.summary: Allow users to save partially completed forms and resume later.
epics.description: Enable customers to save drafts of incomplete applications and return to them later without data loss. The portal should securely store partial data and uploaded documents, ensuring encrypted preservation. Include a dashboard section for users to view, edit, or delete their saved applications while maintaining proper session management and data security practices.

epics.title: Core Banking Integration and Data Synchronization
epics.summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the bank’s core banking systems for data consistency.
epics.description: Develop a robust integration layer connecting the portal with the bank’s core banking system. This integration should handle bidirectional data flow for accounts, user profiles, and service requests. Implement synchronization mechanisms to ensure data accuracy and handle errors gracefully. Focus on secure communication protocols and maintain high system reliability for uninterrupted service.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control and Authorization
epics.summary: Implement fine-grained access control to restrict user actions based on roles.
epics.description: Design a flexible role-based access control framework that restricts features and data visibility based on a user’s role and authorization level. Allow administrative users to define and manage roles through a secure management interface. Ensure that unauthorized access to restricted data or functionality is prevented and audit all role-change activities for security and accountability.

epics.title: Independent Database and Performance Optimization
epics.summary: Develop a dedicated database layer for scalability and improved response times.
epics.description: Set up an independent database architecture that supports the portal’s transactions and analytics functions without overloading the core banking systems. Implement indexing, caching, and query optimization strategies to enhance performance. Incorporate monitoring tools to track database health and ensure high availability through replication, clustering, and failover configurations.

user_stories.epic_title: Secure User Authentication with Multi-Factor Login
user_stories.title: Implement multi-factor authentication mechanism
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to log in using multi-factor authentication, so that my account is more secure.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The authentication module should support credentials and an additional factor such as OTP, biometrics, or a hardware token.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. The system must prompt for an additional authentication factor after the user enters their credentials.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer logs in with their credentials, When the system prompts for an additional authentication factor, Then the user should be able to authenticate using OTP, biometrics, or a hardware token.

user_stories.title: Develop personalized dashboard interface
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to see a personalized dashboard, so that I can quickly access relevant products and services.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The dashboard should be dynamic, personalized, and present a summary of the customer’s account, available products, and services.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. The dashboard displays account summary and personalized product recommendations. 2. The interface is responsive across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer logs into the portal, When they navigate to the dashboard, Then the dashboard should display their account summary and personalized products and services.

user_stories.epic_title: Streamlined Account Opening and Service Workflows
user_stories.title: Implement streamlined account opening workflow
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want a simple workflow to open a new account, so that the process is quick and straightforward.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The workflow should minimize steps, pre-fill customer data, offer field validation, and allow document uploads.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. The workflow minimizes the number of steps required. 2. Customer data is pre-filled where applicable. 3. The system allows document uploads during submission.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer initiates an account opening request, When they follow the workflow steps, Then the system should pre-fill their data, validate input, and allow for document uploads.

user_stories.epic_title: Real-Time Request Tracking and Email Notifications
user_stories.title: Develop real-time request tracking module
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to track my service request status in real-time, so that I am updated about the progress.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The tracking module should allow customers to monitor progress and reflect updates instantly.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Customers can view the real-time status of their service requests. 2. All updates are reflected instantly in the portal.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer submits a service request, When they check the status, Then the system should show real-time progress updates.

user_stories.epic_title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Audit Logs
user_stories.title: Create structured activity log for user interactions
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to see my activity history, so that I can review my interactions within the portal.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The activity log must be intuitive, searchable, and record all user interactions including logins and service requests.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. The history view is intuitive and searchable. 2. All user interactions are recorded accurately.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer navigates to the activity log, When they search for their interactions, Then the system should display a structured and accurate history of their activities.

user_stories.title: Enable saving of incomplete applications
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to save partially completed forms, so that I can resume them later without data loss.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The portal should securely store partial data and uploaded documents, allowing users to edit or delete saved applications.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Customers can save drafts of incomplete applications. 2. Data and documents are preserved securely.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer partially completes an application, When they save and exit, Then the system should allow them to resume the application later without data loss.

user_stories.epic_title: Core Banking Integration and Data Synchronization
user_stories.title: Integrate the portal with the core banking system
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want consistent data between the portal and banking systems, so that my account information is always accurate.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Integration should handle bidirectional data flow, ensure data accuracy, and secure communication.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Accurate and consistent data synchronization. 2. Secure communication implemented.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer updates their profile in the portal, When the system synchronizes with core banking, Then the updated data should reflect accurately in both systems.

user_stories.title: Implement role-based access control framework
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to manage user roles and their access, so that unauthorized access is prevented.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Admins should manage roles via a secure interface, and all role changes should be audited.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Users’ access is restricted based on roles. 2. Audit logs are maintained for all role changes.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an admin adjusts a user's role, When the user logs in, Then their access should be restricted based on the new role.

user_stories.title: Set up an independent database layer
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want a fast and responsive portal experience, so that my interactions are seamless.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Database architecture should support transactions, analytics functions, and implement optimization strategies.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Enhanced performance through indexing and caching. 2. High availability with replication and failover configurations.
user_stories.test_cases: Given high portal traffic, When database queries are executed, Then the system should maintain fast response times and high availability.

architecture_generation.description: This architecture represents a modern, user-friendly self-service banking portal integrating various Azure services for UI, security, API management, backend services, data storage, notifications, real-time updates, core banking system integration, monitoring, logging, RBAC, CI/CD, and compliance.

architecture_validation.updatedDescription: The architecture has been enhanced to address critical security and reliability issues by introducing Azure Web Application Firewall (WAF) and implementing a multi-region disaster recovery plan for databases. Operational excellence, performance efficiency, and cost optimization recommendations have been noted for future improvements. The updated architecture ensures a more secure, reliable, and scalable self-service banking portal.
